content.p: Our collective aim in the Faculty of Medicine and Health Sciences is to make a positive and meaningful impact on global change and the world's health. To achieve this, we are working in collaboration with local and global healthcare providers, other leading universities, and industry partners to transform human and animal healthcare and the life sciences through high quality and impactful research. Our education and training of healthcare professionals and life scientists – informed by this inspiring research – is delivered in a diverse and inclusive community that is working to foster innovation, teamwork, and lifelong learning to support our staff and students to be leaders in healthcare, education and research. Professor Sube Banerjee Faculty Pro-Vice-Chancellor University Strategy
